title: Quests
description: Schema for quests given to major civilizations by city states.

name.description: Defines criteria of quest. Must be one of the predefined names for behavior.

description.description: Description of the quest shown to players.

influence.description: Influence reward gained on quest completion.

duration.description: Maximum number of turns to complete the quest. 0 means no turn limit.

minimumCivs.description: Minimum number of Civs needed to start the quest. Only meaningful for type = Global.

weightForCityStateType.description: Relative weight multiplier for each city state type or personality.
